titles.title: Exalt The Lord! He Is Clothed In Majesty

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Exalt the Lord, He is clothed in majesty,
Holy is He;
Exalt the Lord, He has girded Himself with strength,
Holy is He.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Rise up, O soul, and praise Him joyfully,
Rise up, O heart, and praise His name,
Exalt the Lord, He is clothed in majesty,
Holy is He.
